title: Taric Rework
body:
With the "Poopy" update complete and pretty much ready to ship in the next few patches my mind once again shifts to Taric. The 'ol boy has been confirmed for a rework, most likely after Poopy and honestly I'm keen. 

There has been talk of Taric becoming a bigger, better modern ... support. Now don't get me wrong I love playing support but in all honesty Taric is the last bastion of hope for the 'fuck the meta' pioneers since Kindred became a thing. 

Take him top and maul everyone who isn't smart enough to get armor pen or 1% lifesteal. Take him mid and show off your sick E skillshots. Do whatever you want, hell it's Taric. 

If he is made to be a support then everything the community sees as being Taric may be lost, except for Taric x Ezreal r34.

Don't bring back s3 Taric, I mean that was a little over the top but instead bring us a Taric that fucks Riven mains while still looking OUTRAGEOUS!!

And you know, if he makes his grand re-appearance before 2017 that would be sexy AF. 

Long live Fighter/Tank Taric. Please RIP support Taric.




(RIP Yorick, 2011 - 2012) {{item:3070}}
